title: SolarScreen iOS / Apple Watch
description:
SolarScreen is an app that gives you real time updates on the intensity of UV rays harmful to skin in your region. I built the iOS and Apple Watch versions of SolarScreen from the ground up, for Montana Root Applications Inc, and supported it after release with bug fixes and new features.

I designed and implemented the UI / UX for SolarScreen-- working closely with our CEO Ryan Duarte, to design / iterate on mockups with his feedback. I also graphic designed some marketing materials, and internal pamphlets for the company.
